headline: Deleting TikTok for physical health reasons
description: Today I'm deleting TikTok, which has become one of my favorite past-times. I've laughed and learned things I never knew I wanted to know. Endless hours of looking down at my phone has given me worsening posture and annoying upper back and neck pain. As much fun as it is, I need less reasons to be looking at my phone, not more. I'm also turning off notifications on Signal in an effort to be less inclined to check my phone. Reddit mobile app, you're next.
description_zh-Hans: 今天我要删除TikTok，这已经成为我最喜欢的消遣方式之一。我笑了，学到了我从来不知道自己想知道的东西。无休止地低头看手机，使我的姿势越来越差，上背部和颈部也越来越痛。尽管它很有趣，但我需要更少的理由看我的手机，而不是更多。我还关闭了Signal上的通知，以努力减少查看手机的倾向。Reddit手机应用程序，你是下一个。
